sentences.en: Any head teacher who made errors like this would be chucked out.
sentences.cn: 哪个校长只要犯了这样的错误都会被开除。

sentences.en: Encouraging teacher transfer would not, by itself, integrate the teaching corps.
sentences.cn: 鼓励教师调动本身不会消弭教学队伍中的种族隔离。

sentences.en: He was now a teacher and a respectable member of the community.
sentences.cn: 他现在是一位教师，并且是社区内受人尊敬的一员。

sentences.en: Her teacher recalled: "She was always on about modelling."
sentences.cn: 她的老师回忆说：“她那时老是说要当模特。”

sentences.en: His remedial teacher sees signs of progress in his reading and writing.
sentences.cn: 他的辅导教师发现了他在阅读和写作方面进步的迹象。

sentences.en: I became a teacher because I preferred books and people to politics.
sentences.cn: 我当了老师，因为我更喜欢书本和人而不是权术。

sentences.en: I really could not have wished for a better teacher.
sentences.cn: 这个老师对我来说是再好不过的了。

sentences.en: Not surprisingly, her teacher is getting irritated with her.
sentences.cn: 毫不奇怪，她的老师有点被她惹恼了。

sentences.en: Parents will be able to discuss their child's progress with their teacher.
sentences.cn: 家长将可以和老师交流谈论子女的进步情况。

sentences.en: She was a gifted teacher who never talked down to her students.
sentences.cn: 她天生就是当老师的料，从来不用居高临下的口气对学生说话。

sentences.en: The classroom teacher must be sensitive to a child'sneeds.
sentences.cn: 班主任必须对小学生的需求体察入微。

sentences.en: The teacher kept the boys in detention after school.
sentences.cn: 老师将这些男生课后留堂。

sentences.en: The teacher training college put up a plaque to the college's founder.
sentences.cn: 那所教师培训学院为该学院的创立者立了一块纪念牌匾。

sentences.en: The teacher who took us for economics was Miss Humphrey.
sentences.cn: 教我们经济学的是汉弗莱小姐。

sentences.en: With apologies to my old history teacher, who needs history lessons?
sentences.cn: 这话对不住我亲爱的历史老师，不过有谁需要历史课呢？

words.tran_cn: 启发者,宣传者,传道者,牧师,提问者
顾问,导游,解释者,注解者

phrases.tran_cn: 助教，助理教师；一般教学人员
中文老师，汉语教师；语文老师

trans.tran_cn: 教师，教员，老师，先生，[航]教练机
trans.tran_en: someone whose job is to teach, especially in a school

trans.tran_cn: 教师, 老师, 导师
trans.tran_en: someone whose job is to teach, especially in a school
